information: J.P.E. TRADE COMPANY, S.A. was established in 1.989 as an import, export and distribution company covering the whole national spanish market. During this years, our company has been actively operating in national and international trade accumulating over 25 years of experience, acting as importers, exporters, distributors or agents of several foreigner manufacturers whose target was to introduce their products in the Spanish market. We have our own storage facilities and our national distribution structure needed for the right logistic function. Since 1.989 we have been storing our products in our installations, planning stock strategies, and distributing the goods to the clients in Spanish territory, including Canary Islands and Portugal. We work with most important customers including retailers, hypermarkets, supermarket chains, hard discount, etc.. We sell the products under our own brand or with the customers private label.
